title: Slab serif face on new NFL.com website
content:
I’ve seen this face on NFL print ads, online as well as on-air. Anyone know anything about it?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015171921im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/nfl1_5000.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015171921im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/nfl2_6054.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015171921im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/nfl3_4386.jpg)

 [‹ (x) very thin grotesque - Helvetica {Patricia}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015171921/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36884 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Guys and Dolls movie poster - Kabel, Romeo {Jan E, Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015171921/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36862 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dohdoh

comments.content:
Hand drawn font for NFL by Landor

Mark : )

Hand drawn or Modified?

I’m such a cynic.
looks like a slightly modified Dispatch to me.

\> looks like a slightly modified Dispatch to me.

Naw. Dispatch has differing vertical strokewidths. S and C are quite different.
It looks a lot like what WIRED is using these days, which apparently is custom by H&FJ.
Seriously? I think I bloodied my own nose.
